dmca.title: Copyright Infringement - Immediate Action Required
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: Ron Wainscott Photography [mailto:ron@ronwainscottphotography.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, August 10, 2005 7:56 PM
To: imagevenue.com support
Cc: abuse@theplanet.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Re: Copyright Infringement - Immediate Action Required

The following pictures also need to be removed IMMEDIATELY.  These photos
are my material and were uploaded to your server WITHOUT MY PERMISSION.  I
expect these and all other photos from http://www.dawnavril.com to be
deleted from your server immediately and corrective measures put in place to
make sure that you no longer host content stolen from my websites.
http://img9.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc44&image=3cc_740_10.jpg
http://img30.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc4&image=222_765_08.jpg
http://img26.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc90&image=258_866_56.jpg
http://img36.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc290&image=d45_8f5_043.jpg
http://img26.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc52&image=883_981_08.jpg
http://img16.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc253&image=177_a1d_564.jpg
http://img35.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc152&image=f07_de0_562.jpg
http://img24.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc148&image=737_DSC00063.jpg
http://img22.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc239&image=4ca_DSC00156.jpg
http://img32.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc192&image=259_DSC00165.jpg
http://img24.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc221&image=dbc_DSC00174.jpg
http://img14.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc258&image=789_e72_32.jpg
http://img18.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc80&image=9d4_mardigras.jpg
http://img7.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc176&image=102_mesh.jpg
http://img34.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc166&image=0c9_a3a_02.jpg
http://img30.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc155&image=d68_a4a_12.jpg
http://img29.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc280&image=b84_add_09.jpg
http://img39.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc191&image=f76_blackshirt.jpg
http://img34.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc135&image=12b_c1f_01.jpg
http://img16.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc299&image=404_c22_04.jpg
http://img34.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc150&image=257_c90_1208_9.jpg
http://img31.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc249&image=639_c99_01.jpg
http://img22.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc86&image=5ae_wp2.jpg
http://img21.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc142&image=e2c_wp.jpg
http://img38.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc201&image=717_wet.jpg
http://img28.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc115&image=d98_tree2.jpg
http://img7.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc92&image=717_tree1.jpg
http://img25.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc171&image=156_tattoo.jpg
http://img7.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc38&image=bf7_slip.jpg
http://img15.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc26&image=b72_red.jpg
http://img32.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc85&image=d01_pinkskirt.jpg

These photos must be removed immediately to avoid any further action.  Legal
action will be taken on Thursday morning (Aug. 11, 2005) if these or any
other pictures belonging to me are still on your server.

Ron Wainscott

----- Original Message -----
From: "imagevenue.com support" <imagevenue@gmail.com>
To: "Ron Wainscott Photography" <ron@ronwainscottphotography.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 10, 2005 4:35 PM
Subject: Re: Copyright Infringement - Immediate Action Required


the files have been deleted.  User acount suspended.

Please understand, that we are a hosting company and do not upload
pics ourselfs.  If there is anything else we can do to help.,please
let us know.


On 8/11/05, Ron Wainscott Photography <ron@ronwainscottphotography.com> 
wrote:
> I DID NOT give your company permission to host the following images.
> Therefore, you are committing copyright infringement by hosting them.  You
> are hereby notified that you have exactly one hour to remove these images
> from your server:
>
> http://img37.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc250&image=d62_05.jpg
> http://img13.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc14&image=335_1a3_561.jpg
> http://img29.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc30&image=dcf_246_06.jpg
> http://img32.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc230&image=5f0_2d1_1209_4.jpg
> http://img38.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc30&image=4e1_34b_03.jpg
> http://img17.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc121&image=8a2_42e_55.jpg
> http://img31.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc290&image=c68_468_11.jpg
> http://img35.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc120&image=597_47d_129.jpg
> http://img17.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc193&image=034_4cc_02.jpg
> http://img38.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc104&image=303_69a_098.jpg
> http://img32.imagevenue.com/img.php?loc=loc268&image=b16_739_05.jpg
>
> These are only a few of the images from my website
> (http://www.dawnavril.com) that are illegally being hosted on your server.
> Within one hour, I expect EVERY image with a "DawnAvril.com" copyright 
> logo
> to be removed from your server.  I DO NOT tolerate theft of my work!  A
> complaint has already been filed with your hosting company.  More serious
> action will be taken if you refuse to cooperate with me.
>
> Ron Wainscott
> http://www.dawnavril.com
